statements: DELETE FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE inspector_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM ProductTraceability WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Industries';
DELETE FROM QualityControlInspections WHERE passed = FALSE AND inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ProductTraceability WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company' OR manufacturing_date > '2021-06-01';
DELETE FROM Products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
DELETE FROM Product WHERE product_name = 'Sample Product';
DELETE FROM inspection_logs WHERE inspection_id = 10 AND log_id = 5;
